title: Is Apple going to stop supporting the iPhone? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is kind of like asking if Ford is going to quit making vehicles. So, not in the foreseeable future. Why would they? It is perhaps their most profitable product and they keep investing millions in product research and development.

If Apple did that, they would be losing much of their earnings! The iPhone is one of their most successful products and does well in the market, being popular worldwide. So why would they stop supporting it? There’s no reason to do that.
